name: Oui, Chef!!
description:
Make food!!

Oui, Chef!! is a single player restaurant management game that presents players with a machine learning problem to solve and friendly AI to train how to solve the same problem! Food is made by associating items from the menu with the ingredients needed to make it. 

Train employees!!

Employees can be hired to help out in the kitchen! When an employee is told to prepare an order, it uses its neural network to select the required ingredients. The player can choose to accept what the employee made or have the employee remake it, training the network to select the correct ingredients next time.

Stay open!!

Every week, operational costs and employee salaries need to be paid! If you cannot then the restaurant will close. If there is not enough cash to pay everyone then some employees must be let go, never to return.

;_____________________________;
